subject: Soccer
Officiating (Sports)
Computers and the Internet
Cameras
Instant Replay (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The success of the cameras-and-software system created by the German firm GoalControl is crucial in helping soccer catch up to other major sports in its use of technology.
